name: Neill et al., Appellants, v. Bloch, et al.

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Neill et al., Appellants, v. Bloch, et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Schaepeb,
This case is ruled by Neill v. Gimbel Brothers, Inc., 330 Pa. 213. It is ordered that the decree of the court below be modified as therein directed. Costs to be paid by defendants.
Mr. Justice Dbew dissents.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Schaepeb,

attorneys: Robert T. McCracken, with him Nochem 8. Winnet and George G. Chandler, for appellants.
Joseph B. Winokur, of Loewenstein & Winokur, with him Evans, Bayard & Frick, Brown & Williams and Sundheim, Folz é 8undheim, for appellee.
Carlos Berguido, Jr., and Robert Rosenberg, filed a brief on behalf of Retail Opticians of America, amici curiae.
casebody.head_matter:
Neill et al., Appellants, v. Bloch, et al.
Argued January 11, 1938.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Robert T. McCracken, with him Nochem 8. Winnet and George G. Chandler, for appellants.
Joseph B. Winokur, of Loewenstein & Winokur, with him Evans, Bayard & Frick, Brown & Williams and Sundheim, Folz é 8undheim, for appellee.
Carlos Berguido, Jr., and Robert Rosenberg, filed a brief on behalf of Retail Opticians of America, amici curiae.
March 21, 1938:
